original_text: The four wheels were under the panels, and the axles of the wheels were attached to the stand. The diameter of each wheel was a cubit and a half.
korean_text: 네 바퀴는 옆판 밑에 있고 바퀴 축은 받침 수레에 연결되었는데 바퀴의 높이는 각각 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: The four wheels were under the panels
sentences.korean_translation: 네 개의 바퀴가 판 아래에 있었다

sentences.original_text: and the axles of the wheels were attached to the stand
The diameter of each wheel was a cubit and a half
sentences.korean_translation: 각 바퀴의 지름은 한 규빗 반 이었다
